schemas.semanticDescription: A user flow — a sequence of user stories representing a path through the product

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: What is the user trying to accomplish?

schemas.semanticDescription: A user story — a discrete thing the user wants to do, sequenced within a flow
An architectural layer — a major boundary in the system that contains modules

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: What this layer is responsible for

ports.label: Modules
ports.semanticDescription: Modules that live in this layer

ports.label: Depended By
ports.semanticDescription: Layers that depend on this layer

schemas.semanticDescription: A code unit within an architectural layer — a hook, component, function, class, adapter, or store. Has dual flow channels: write path (top-to-bottom) and notification path (bottom-to-top).

fields.name: moduleKind
fields.label: Kind
fields.semanticDescription: What kind of code unit this is

ports.label: Writes In
ports.semanticDescription: Commands or data writes flowing in from above

ports.label: Writes Out
ports.semanticDescription: Commands or data writes flowing out downward

ports.label: Notifies
ports.semanticDescription: Change notifications flowing upward to consumers

schemas.semanticDescription: An external system boundary — where flows enter or leave the Carta system. Has dual flow channels for write and notification paths.
A major act or phase of the Carta product demo. Stages build on each other sequentially to tell a progressive story.

fields.name: narrative
fields.label: Narrative
fields.placeholder: What you say/show during this stage

fields.name: keyInsight
fields.label: Key Insight
fields.placeholder: The one thing the audience should take away

schemas.semanticDescription: A specific thing demonstrated within a demo stage. Represents a concrete action or feature shown to the audience.

fields.name: demonstrates
fields.label: What's Demonstrated
fields.placeholder: The capability or concept being shown

fields.name: howShown
fields.label: How It's Shown
fields.placeholder: The specific action performed in the demo

schemas.semanticDescription: A value proposition or claim the demo makes about Carta. Connected to beats that serve as evidence for the claim.

fields.name: evidence
fields.label: Evidence
fields.placeholder: Why this claim is credible based on what was shown

schemas.semanticDescription: A UI interaction that implements a CRUD operation on a document resource

fields.name: interaction
fields.label: Interaction
fields.semanticDescription: How the user performs this action
fields.placeholder: e.g., Drag from source port handle to target

ports.label: Implements
ports.semanticDescription: The CRUD operation this UI interaction implements

schemas.semanticDescription: An MCP tool that implements a CRUD operation on a document resource

ports.label: Implements
ports.semanticDescription: The CRUD operation this MCP tool implements

schemas.semanticDescription: A document-model entity (level, construct, schema, port, connection, organizer, etc.) with CRUD operation ports

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.semanticDescription: What this resource represents in the document model

schemas.semanticDescription: A lightweight inline annotation that sits on a data flow edge, describing what data or signals move between two constructs. Uses intercept/relay ports to transparently pass through any connection type.

ports.label: In
ports.semanticDescription: Accepts incoming flow from any source

ports.label: Out
ports.semanticDescription: Forwards flow to any downstream sink

schemas.semanticDescription: React component in the Carta web client. Models structural UI components with their layer placement and rendering relationships.
Custom React hook. Encapsulates state logic, side effects, or derived data that components consume.
React context provider. Makes shared state available to the component subtree without prop drilling.

fields.name: provides
fields.label: Provides
fields.placeholder: What data/functions this context makes available

schemas.semanticDescription: State adapter bridging UI layer and a backing store (Yjs, localStorage, etc). Implements the DocumentAdapter interface.
Pure utility function or module. Stateless computation — takes inputs, returns outputs, no side effects.
HTTP REST API endpoint

ports.label: Flow Out
ports.semanticDescription: Downstream flow to services or handlers

fields.name: route
fields.label: Route
fields.semanticDescription: URL path pattern for this endpoint

fields.name: summary
fields.label: Summary
fields.semanticDescription: Brief description of endpoint purpose and behavior

fields.name: responseType
fields.label: Response Type
fields.semanticDescription: Expected return type of this endpoint

schemas.semanticDescription: Authentication and authorization policy for API endpoints
Rate limiting policy for API endpoints
Caching policy for API endpoints
Database instance or schema container

ports.label: Tables
ports.semanticDescription: Tables that belong to this database

fields.name: note
fields.label: Note
fields.semanticDescription: Additional notes or context about this database

schemas.semanticDescription: Database table or entity

ports.label: Referenced By
ports.semanticDescription: Tables or constructs that reference this table

ports.label: References
ports.semanticDescription: Tables or constructs this table references

ports.label: Attributes & Constraints
ports.semanticDescription: Attributes and constraints that belong to this table

schemas.semanticDescription: A database table attribute/column

fields.name: dataType
fields.label: Type
fields.semanticDescription: SQL data type for this column

fields.name: primaryKey
fields.label: Primary Key
fields.semanticDescription: Whether this column is part of the primary key

fields.name: nullable
fields.label: Nullable
fields.semanticDescription: Whether this column allows NULL values

schemas.semanticDescription: A database constraint (unique, foreign key, check, etc.)
Request or response model for an API endpoint

fields.name: modelName
fields.label: Model Name
fields.semanticDescription: Name of the request or response model type

fields.name: modelType
fields.label: Model Type
fields.semanticDescription: Whether this is a request or response model

fields.name: data
fields.label: Data
fields.semanticDescription: Structure and fields of the model

ports.label: Controller
ports.semanticDescription: Controller endpoint that uses this model

schemas.semanticDescription: A user interaction or event in the UI

fields.name: eventName
fields.label: Event Name
fields.semanticDescription: Name of the UI event or user action

fields.name: trigger
fields.label: Trigger
fields.semanticDescription: What causes this event to fire

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.semanticDescription: Detailed description of the event behavior and purpose
fields.placeholder: Describe the event or user action

ports.label: Events
ports.semanticDescription: Child events that originate from this event

ports.label: Flow Out
ports.semanticDescription: Next UI flow that follows this event

schemas.semanticDescription: A screen or view in the user interface

fields.name: screenName
fields.label: Screen Name
fields.semanticDescription: Name of the UI screen or view

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.semanticDescription: Purpose and content of this screen

ports.label: Flow In
ports.semanticDescription: Incoming UI flow into this screen

ports.label: Events
ports.semanticDescription: Events that belong to this screen

schemas.semanticDescription: A user story or requirement

fields.name: title
fields.label: Title
fields.semanticDescription: Short title summarizing the user story

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.semanticDescription: Full user story in "As a X, I want Y, so that Z" format
fields.placeholder: As a [user], I want [goal] so that [benefit]

schemas.semanticDescription: Technical implementation notes and documentation

fields.name: details
fields.label: Details
fields.semanticDescription: Implementation notes, technical details, or documentation
fields.placeholder: Enter implementation details, notes, or documentation here...

schemas.semanticDescription: A freeform note or annotation
Generic box for rough modeling
A task or subprocess in a business process

ports.label: Lane
ports.semanticDescription: Lane or pool containing this activity

schemas.semanticDescription: A start, intermediate, or end event in a business process

fields.name: eventPosition
fields.label: Position
fields.semanticDescription: Where this event occurs in the process

ports.label: Lane
ports.semanticDescription: Lane or pool containing this event

schemas.semanticDescription: A decision or merge point in a business process

ports.label: Lane
ports.semanticDescription: Lane or pool containing this gateway

schemas.semanticDescription: A participant or organization in a business process

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.semanticDescription: Role or responsibility of this participant

schemas.semanticDescription: A role or department subdivision within a pool

ports.label: Elements
ports.semanticDescription: Activities, events, and gateways in this lane

schemas.semanticDescription: An information artifact used or produced by activities

ports.label: Used By
ports.semanticDescription: Activities that use or produce this data

schemas.semanticDescription: AWS Lambda serverless function

ports.label: Triggers
ports.semanticDescription: Event sources that invoke this function

schemas.semanticDescription: AWS API Gateway REST or HTTP API

AWS DynamoDB NoSQL table
AWS SQS message queue

ports.semanticDescription: Services that send messages to this queue

ports.semanticDescription: Services that consume from this queue

schemas.semanticDescription: AWS SNS pub/sub topic

ports.label: Publishers
ports.semanticDescription: Services that publish to this topic

schemas.semanticDescription: AWS RDS relational database instance

ports.label: Clients
ports.semanticDescription: Services that connect to this database

schemas.semanticDescription: AWS Virtual Private Cloud network
AWS Step Functions state machine workflow
Step Functions task state that performs work
Step Functions choice state for branching logic

ports.label: Default
ports.semanticDescription: Default branch if no conditions match

schemas.semanticDescription: Step Functions parallel state for concurrent execution

ports.label: Next
ports.semanticDescription: Next state after all branches complete

schemas.semanticDescription: Step Functions map state for iterating over arrays
Step Functions wait state for delays
Step Functions succeed or fail terminal state
A top-level business or product domain grouping related features

fields.name: description
fields.label: Description
fields.placeholder: Describe the domain boundary and responsibilities

ports.label: Depended By
ports.semanticDescription: Domains that depend on this domain

schemas.semanticDescription: A coherent set of capabilities within a domain

ports.label: Depended By
ports.semanticDescription: Features that depend on this feature

schemas.semanticDescription: An atomic ability the system provides, materialized in user flows

fields.name: preconditions
fields.label: Preconditions
fields.semanticDescription: What must be true before this capability can execute

fields.name: effects
fields.label: Effects
fields.semanticDescription: What becomes true after this capability executes

ports.label: Flow In
ports.semanticDescription: Previous step in a user flow

ports.label: Flow Out
ports.semanticDescription: Next step in a user flow

schemas.semanticDescription: A user need or goal, implemented by one or more user flows

fields.name: story
fields.label: Story
fields.placeholder: As a [persona], I want [goal] so that [benefit]

fields.name: acceptance
fields.label: Acceptance Criteria
fields.semanticDescription: Conditions that must be true for this story to be satisfied

ports.label: Implemented By
ports.semanticDescription: User flows that implement this story

schemas.semanticDescription: A sequence of materialized capabilities that implements a user story

fields.name: outcome
fields.label: Outcome
fields.placeholder: e.g., User has active premium subscription

portSchemas.semanticDescription: Contains or owns the connected construct
Is contained by or owned by the connected construct
Pass-through input accepting any source connection (bypasses type checking)
Pass-through output connecting to any sink port (bypasses type checking)
